lines.text: When the Mighty Nein return, tell them I'm okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When the Mighty Nein return, send them on to something something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we frame it right, it could cover when people find out that she's definitely dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, but something drove me to go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, like it's a suicide note?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, no, no, no, no, like, I needed to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hate being one of the bad guys!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to end it all!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When the Mighty Nein return, send them after me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, where we're going, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Send them to previously agreed place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, keep it vague, keep it vague.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to-- Hold on, I'm going to make sure that guiding myself won't cancel that out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To make it sound really authentic, though, should it be from the Lavorre--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't guide yourself on top of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm like, I'm not going to guide myself, but you can guide me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think you should make it from the Lavorre & Nott law firm, just so that it's extra authentic!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, why?! That doesn't make any sense! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: La-la-la, I'm going to write all those things that we just said.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just sent you a close-up of the map so you can see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, put a lot of As in this note.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Haaaay-- Without even spelling it right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With much magical direction placed upon this forgery attempt with the modicum of example handwriting that you hope is hers, I would like you to go ahead and make your roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so, you have your proficiency bonus to it, which is five, I believe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then what's your dex bonus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Advantage and one re-roll, if you need it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are the greatest trickster that has ever walked the earth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I try to use my--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, you have to think--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- would you use it later today?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But if I use it, does that cancel out the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, can you roll higher?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could I use it if I want to, but--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you can use it if you want.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, wait, you can't add his stuff to this roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Choose which of the d20s to use.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to stick with 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you complete the forgery, feeling pretty damn good with the work you did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And squirt a little perfume on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're impressed. With what little you're able to pull from this, you're, like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Little lipstick smear on the corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If adventuring wasn't working, and the Gentleman was looking, you have a bright future.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you feel confident that this'll probably work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We made sure 100% there's no blood left in this room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we take the blood-soaked stuff and put it in our Bag of Holding?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We make sure there's no spare socks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take all of her stuff that she left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No plushies have gotten knocked under the bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whoever's keeping track of the contents of the Bag of Holding, write "bloody DeRogna remnants."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll dump it in a dumpster on the way out of town.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not just throw in a snowdrift in the middle of the tundra somewhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is going in the fire river for sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can't solve all of our problems by throwing them into the fire river.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should meet up with what's his name, Dagen?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It'll be an awkward conversation with Dagen later.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's going to be, like, 30 awkward conversations because of this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just, you know, he likes his drinks, so we could just keep him in the sweet middle ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A little hazy all the time?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To be fair, I think he only cared about being paid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we have the infinite flask?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much does he get paid?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, she was going to pay us 75,000 gold, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not going to get that anymore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh man. Hadn't thought that far!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aww, why'd we have to do that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey, I wasn't, I wasn't hired to keep her safe!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It feels like the end of Se7en, where we missed the-- (groans)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe we should still get, like, a third, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I literally wrote down in my notebook, "Kill Vess!" (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just a bunch of things that she wants to kill.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You could send a message to your husband, letting him know you completed the task.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys just exit down the stairs on the way out?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have the dagger? (clicks tongue)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'd have to re-attune to it. It'll take an hour.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do that if you want to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't we want it to be opened, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you un-attune from it, it does unlock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless we really want it locked, because I can do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're not going to disturb that door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, she's not going to magically lock a door when she left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're all sitting there with their cards, just watching you go by, a little intimidated by what you represent and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just stop and eyeball them as everyone else walks past.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They just cough and go back to their card game quietly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You ready to go see some crazy shit?" (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When you put it that way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Oh, how much was it again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I can't do that, but some of you can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can put in a couple hundred.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, done and done with Caduceus and me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the guards on the side begin to step back, and slowly, the heavy, creaking sound and impact (creaking), grinding noise, as the gates open and push into the dirt and snow, and there beyond, you can see the cold, white and blue horizon of the rest of Eiselcross awaiting you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a bad feeling about this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This has been a fucking roller coaster.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And just walks out into the snow. (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did you do? What did you make, and then you let it die?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: True, you made a nuke, and then you died, and you left the nuke in the middle of a field somewhere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, not much, but, you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very specifically, I have no clue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gave me a blank slate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. You get real Eddie Izzard vibes, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what I'm going to find.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm getting Eddie Izzard vibes with the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We really should've done a better job of protecting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so mad that I was sitting here, being like, "What does it all mean?" And he was, like, "It means he's upstairs."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She probably, even if we had gone upstairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It means he's 25 feet away is what it meant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who knows? She could've been dead for, you know, an hour when I scryed on him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe that wasn't her at dinner at all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All I know is I want to read the poem.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, she would've known that there was an account, so the offer to pay for dinner wouldn't have--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, in what world would she not have gone, "There is no paid dinner."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to put that out there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, he ate vegetables! Like Molly did! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She grabbed a bottle of wine like Molly did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we'd just walked her back to her room, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, I'm just pointing that out, that it was, like-- the worst thing is we're "Weekend at Bernie's 2." We're not even the original "Weekend at Bernie's."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll have to put together a proper soundtrack for you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did he watch us land at the dock and come into the fort, and was just tracking us the whole time from when we landed at port?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No one knew about a purple-- I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We asked around a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He could've been in disguise the whole time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't know who or what he really is, what his abilities are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we recording? I don't even know anymore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he did see me scrying.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Save it for "Talks," guys, save it for "Talks!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very, very happy Halloween to all of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We love you very much, and is it Thursday yet? Good night! (smacking) (howling)
